inclusion.criterion: Prostatectomy patients with previously undetectable PSA and subsequent biochemical recurrence
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of allergic reaction to Fluciclovine
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Anti Androgen treatment in the 6 months prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a candidate for urethral catheterization and TURP. Further evaluation revealed normal recent blood chemistry.
